remarks: The scalar field of a quotient structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
qusbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( R /s .~ ) ) $.
qusbas.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
qusbas.e $e |- ( ph -> .~ e. W ) $.
qusbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
quss.k $e |- K = ( Scalar ` R ) $.
quss $p |- ( ph -> K = ( Scalar ` U ) ) $.
